summary:
TidyWindow – Latest Update

Safety Improvements

Expanded protected folder coverage to include Program Files, ProgramData, and user-profile roots.
Default cleanup now skips hidden, system, and recent files, with clear toggles to override.
Recycle Bin behavior corrected <-> no silent permanent deletes, with explicit fallback handling.
Force delete now requires manual arming, auto-disarms after use, and includes clearer warnings.

Detection & Scan Enhancements

Added an independent toggle for system files instead of tying them to hidden items.
Deep scan now supports in-flight cancellation with a live cancellation token.

Browser & Cleanup Coverage

Browser cleanup expanded beyond Edge with support for Chrome and Firefox profiles.

Service & Automation Reliability

Service control execution now uses a validated internal service name to avoid mismatches.
Manual “Run Now” works even when automation is turned off.
Updated service timeout logic (no fixed limit, respects disabled or slow services).
Threat Watch now includes parent process and command-line metadata to improve triage context.

TL;DR
Safer deletes • Wider protection • Correct recycle handling
Browser support • Cancel scans • Reliable services
Smarter threat intel <-> Everything tightened and fixed
